simple.gui.layout
Class GridBagPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container

                  simple.gui.layout.GridBagPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GridBagPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Simplifies the use of GridBagLayout for everyday needs.
Created: 2006

Author:
Kenneth Pierce
See Also:
GridBagLayout, GridBagConstraints, Serialized Form

 void add(java.awt.Component c, int col, int row)
          Adds c to the specified cell at col, row.
Sets the current column and row to col and row repsectively.
 void addToColumn(java.awt.Component c)
          Adds c to the current column, one row down.
Increments row position by one.
 void addToRow(java.awt.Component c)
          Adds c to the current row, one column from the current.
Increments column position by one.
 int getColumn()
          Returns the current column.
 int getRow()
          Returns the current row.
 void setAnchorPosition(int position)
          Sets the alignment of the component in its cell.
Valid values are:
CENTER, NORTH, NORTHEAST, EAST, SOUTHEAST, SOUTH, SOUTHWEST, WEST, and NORTHWEST.
PAGE_START, PAGE_END, LINE_START, LINE_END, FIRST_LINE_START, FIRST_LINE_END, LAST_LINE_START and LAST_LINE_END.
The default value is CENTER.
 void setFillMethod(int method)
          Sets the method used to resize the component to its cell.
Valid values are:
NONE: Do not resize the component.
HORIZONTAL: Make the component wide enough to fill its display area horizontally, but do not change its height.
VERTICAL: Make the component tall enough to fill its display area vertically, but do not change its width.
BOTH: Make the component fill its display area entirely.
The default value is NONE

Method Detail

setAnchorPosition

public void setAnchorPosition(int position)
Sets the alignment of the component in its cell.
Valid values are:
CENTER, NORTH, NORTHEAST, EAST, SOUTHEAST, SOUTH, SOUTHWEST, WEST, and NORTHWEST.
PAGE_START, PAGE_END, LINE_START, LINE_END, FIRST_LINE_START, FIRST_LINE_END, LAST_LINE_START and LAST_LINE_END.
The default value is CENTER.

Parameters:
position -

setFillMethod

public void setFillMethod(int method)
Sets the method used to resize the component to its cell.
Valid values are:
NONE: Do not resize the component.
HORIZONTAL: Make the component wide enough to fill its display area horizontally, but do not change its height.
VERTICAL: Make the component tall enough to fill its display area vertically, but do not change its width.
BOTH: Make the component fill its display area entirely.
The default value is NONE

Parameters:
method -
